headline: Why Dollar General (DG) Is Up 20.9% After Q3 Beat, Guidance Hike And Dividend Update
summary: In the past week, Dollar General reported third-quarter 2025 results showing sales of US$10,649.45 million and net income of US$282.66 million, raised full-year guidance for earnings and net sales growth, and its board declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.59 per share payable in January 2026. The earnings beat, improved outlook and ongoing store expansion and remodel program suggest that operational improvements and value-focused promotions are gaining traction across Dollar General’s...
